DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate patient goal achievement satisfaction benign hysterectomy . Patient 's state goal prior undergo benign hysterectomy , receive follow-up questionnaire 3 month post-operatively evaluate perception goal achievement overall satisfaction . Goal achievement satisfaction evaluate association surgical indication , surgical approach ( minimally invasive v abdominal surgery ) , demographic information .
DOC.brief_title: Goal Achievement Patient Satisfaction Benign Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Patient undergo hysterectomy benign indication Age 18 great English speaking Access communication via telephone Patient undergo hysterectomy malignant premalignant condition Nonenglish speaking patient Patient without telephone access Patient undergo emergent unplanned hysterectomy Vulnerable population
